body_html: Aha! std::call_once hangs under ASAN if you throw an exception inside the call_once block. Eek! https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41717579/stdcall-once-hangs-on-second-call-after-callable-threw-on-first-call
body_text: Aha! std::call_once hangs under ASAN if you throw an exception inside the call_once block. Eek! https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41717579/stdcall-once-hangs-on-second-call-after-callable-threw-on-first-call
body: Aha! `std::call_once` hangs under ASAN if you throw an exception inside the `call_once` block. Eek! https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41717579/stdcall-once-hangs-on-second-call-after-callable-threw-on-first-call
